abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of about 36 MW of
            diesel generation, a new 69 kV transmission system,
            frequency conversion facilities and engineering and training
            services. The proposed Bank loan of $6.0 million equivalent
            would finance the direct foreign exchange costs of frequency
            converters, distribution facilities, material for the
            conversion of customer's equipment, engineering
            services, training services and interest on the Bank loan
            during construction.
